statements: SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, course_content_interaction FROM student_interactions;
SELECT id, discussion_forum_interaction FROM student_interactions;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE course_content_interaction = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, discussion_forum_interaction FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE course_content_interaction = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 123 AND discussion_forum_interaction = TRUE;
SELECT id, student_id FROM student_interactions WHERE course_content_interaction = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(CAST(course_content_interaction AS INT)) AS avg_interaction FROM student_interactions;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forum_discussions WHERE course_id = 100 ORDER BY discussion_date DESC;
SELECT discussion_topic FROM forum_discussions WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM student_interactions WHERE course_id = 200 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_date FROM forum_discussions ORDER BY discussion_date DESC
SELECT MAX(interaction_date), student_id FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id, interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM forum_discussions WHERE student_id = 2)
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_type FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id JOIN courses ON interactions.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz';
SELECT student_name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id > 100 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_courses FROM students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email, course_name, interaction_type FROM students s JOIN interactions i ON s.student_id = i.student_id JOIN courses c ON i.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM content_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, post_content FROM students JOIN forum_interactions ON students.student_id = forum_interactions.student_id ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE course_id = 101
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT student_name, post_content FROM students JOIN forum_interactions ON students.student_id = forum_interactions.student_id
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM forum_posts WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_url FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 4 ORDER BY content_type;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM forum_posts WHERE course_id = 3 AND student_id = 5 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
